39487636.review: Simple in rules, soothing atmosphere, attractive visuals... all in all, a lovely puzzle game in a nice minimalist package.

38583797.review: Well crafted digitzed version of a classic board game. If you're into relaxing puzzles to unwind, then this is for you. 10/10 Will continue to play.

38098508.review:
双开和其他游戏同时玩，终于把所有成就完成了。
游戏没有直接的说明，只有开始的简单玩法指引，我就简单说一下游戏的玩法吧。
游戏如果用跳棋来类比会比较容易理解，游戏在固定位置的棋盘上进行。游戏起始有若干个棋子，棋子只能在棋盘指定的位置，棋子只能用跳过位置相邻的棋子来移动，且可以移动的方向是棋盘预设好的。
棋子总共有蓝和红两种颜色，当同颜色的棋子移动跳过时，被跳过的棋子会被“吃掉”移出棋盘，而不同颜色的棋子移动跳过则不会发生移出。
游戏的目的是通过移动跳过，把棋子的数量减少到只剩一个红色棋子和一个蓝色棋子。

游戏的难度很有层次，越到后面越难，非常适合用来打发时间。
至于攻略，我就说一条核心的解法原则。因为棋子在棋盘上可移动至的位置是固定的，所以同颜色的棋子里，按位置来看其实是有两种，同一种类型的棋子因为无法通过移动达到相邻位置，因此同种类型的棋子是无法相互移出的。总结的说就是，在移出棋子时，要交替移出不同种类的棋子。

然后再介绍一下游戏里的设置选项。
设置左上方的第一项其实我没搞懂用途，第二项是显示当前选定棋子可以移动至的位置，第三项是4种可选的背景图案。
设置右上方是选择背景音乐。
设置左下方是设置背景音乐和效果音的音量大小。
设置右下方是统计数据，按左右上下的次序依次是移动棋子的次数，游戏时间，关卡成就计数和完成日常关卡数。


这款游戏对于想打发时间和益智方面都是很适合的，祝大家游戏愉快！

37600492.review: This is quite the fun minimalist puzzle game.

36514103.review:
由騎士棋的團隊Arzola's再次帶來的小品遊戲，其實就是傳統所謂的孔明棋，玩家需在一個路線固定的棋盤上反覆跳過棋子並逐步減少棋子，直到剩下最後一顆為止，PEG則是基於此基礎上再增加了雙色規則與多樣化的棋盤，讓玩家必須謹慎思考才能替雙色都留下最後一顆棋子。

而說起孔明棋的訣竅則一點也不難，舉例來說最後的傳統十字棋盤上，一個九宮格邊線上會有角棋與邊棋，而不管你怎麼移動，邊棋都會跟其他邊棋走在同樣的位置，角棋亦同，於是該如何輪流削減邊棋與角棋就成了能否順利解謎的重點。

[h1]總結來說我對這款遊戲的評價如下；[/h1]
[list]
[*]在保留傳統孔明棋的玩法上加以創新
[*]以樂趣與遊玩時數來說CP值頗高
[*]跟騎士棋一樣的每日挑戰內容
[*]可設定項目並無因為是小品遊戲而刪減
[/list]

[h1]除了推薦，我沒什麼好說了。[/h1]

36416066.review: 有趣的小遊戲，適合消磨時間來個幾盤，難度不算高，簡單舒服的畫面賞心悅目，玩起來沒有壓力。

36408034.review: This is better then 95 % overpriced indie puzzlers.

36392732.review:
ペグソリティアという有名な古典ゲーム。
棒は隣接する棒を１本だけ飛び越えて空いている穴に移動出来る。
このゲームでは棒が２色あって、飛び越えた棒が色違いだと移動のみ、同色だと消せる。
最終的に赤青１本ずつにするとクリア。
色々なパターンのステージが用意されていて、ちょっとした時間に気軽にプレイ出来るし安いのでお勧めです。

36283182.review:
this is a great puzzle game, very simple concept really well excecuted with plenty of content: 127 levels on 7 different boards, plus 4 boards generated every day once you unlock daily levels. it can take a while, but thankfully you don't need to complete every level on a board to unlock the next, and once you gain access to one, you can play all the levels there in any order. otherwise most players (including me) would be stuck on the circle board or level 1 (ONE!) of the double diamond board for a long time. the latter looks pretty easy until you realize it's the trickiest one of them all, at least on that board (nothing beats circle 14).

the presentation is also worth mentioning. it's colorful and has plenty of settings, unlike most minimalistic puzzle games that tend to take minimalism really seriously and offer no customization whatsoever. there are volume sliders, resolution options, windowed mode, various music tracks, background options, statistics (moves, levels completed, dailies completed, game time), and my favorite: speed settings, plural, because you can customize separately how fast you want pegs to move and the level complete animation to play. really nice. displaying level numbers would be something to consider adding, but there's a level select screen and you can move between levels while playing, so it's not a huge deal, though exactly because of the latter it'd be useful to know where you are on the board.

levels start out easy, then get a lot more challenging, as I mentioned, but it's a really fun game and should be in every puzzle gamer's library. at the price of a single euro/dollar I'd recommend it even if it had half as many levels and no dailies, but as it is, it's an even better value for money, and I'd also like to mention 'customer support' as a positive, very helpful developer, worth supporting what he does.

36249677.review:
Here in my country, it's called Solitaire, I had one when I was a kid and until now I never thought that you can make a full game of puzzles using this old board game. The gameplay is simple, you have to think about the first move and the next moves that are needed to eliminate the PEGS and more important, leave the PEGS close to each other to finish with only one of each color, seems easy? Well is true for the first group of levels, but then the game becomes more and more tricky, and I appreciate this, some days I couldn't finish a level but the next day I resolved it in my first try because I used a different approach.

The game is polished, the animation, controls, and options are there and they work. This seems quite obvious but there are other puzzle games that don't have those things and the gameplay feels tedious after play for a while. The simple art design gives more value to the game, with a low budget the game look really nice. 

I recommend this game, but I don't wanna sound repetitive in my reviews,  the game doesn't have any guide yet, so you should wait a little bit if you don't have patience when you're stuck.

36233867.review:
The first thing that came to mind when I played this was trying to solve those triangle peg puzzles I'd see at restaurants while waiting for my order. This takes that concept and expands it a bit by adding colored pegs that can only remove other pegs of the same color. Keep removing until you're down to one red and blue peg and you complete the level. 

Once you clear the triangle levels, you'll unlock new shaped puzzles that will require some extra thinking and probably some use of the undo button to solve them. With 127 levels and the daily challenges that unlock after you complete 80 levels (and five tranquil music tracks to fit the puzzle mood), it's a nice game to wind down to.

36089932.review: Приятная музыка, минималистичный дизайн и графика в приятных цветах, комфортный интерфейс и развитие логики+релаксация. Милая уютная игра,  в которую приятно поиграть вечерком и расслабиться.

35931063.review:
This is incredibly compulsive for all the apparent simplicity of its appearance.  The creator of the very good puzzler Knights has managed again to take a simple board concept and create puzzling of the highest calibre.  The difficulty does not seem too great for the first 50 levels but it is pleasing in how it shapes your perspective of the game.  Then it does start to get really hard in places to the point where you laugh at your own naivety in thinking the whole game was going to be that easy.  By that point it is too late - you are hooked.

I prefer to write reviews once I have virtually completed a game but this is far from the case here - I just wanted to express my appreciation for the job the creator has done and I am really looking to whatever he makes next, if Knights and this game are anything to go by.

Highly recommended.

35826611.review:
It is what it is and what it is it does well.

Simple, chilled puzzle game of jumping pegs over each other in order that only 2 of each colour remain on the board to complete the round.

Different shaped boards with varying holes and setups of pegs add greater challenge as the game progresses. The music is relaxing and well suited to the zen like feeling of doing something thoughtful.

35721617.review: I used to have a little wooden disc with these pegs and I would play it all day long when I was a kid. It was great. This game is a blast of nostalgia for me. It is so sleek and polished with nice background music. Highly recommended as a fun cozy way to spend some time when you're free. It's even great as something to do with your hands while you listen to a podcast!

35709415.review: A perfect game to play while listening to your podcasts or to that one music album you never took the time to listen to, now's the time.

35707665.review:
Great relaxing puzzle game by the same developers of KNIGHTS.
I'm loving the minimalist style to the game.

35694730.review:
별다른 조작없이 클릭만으로 푸는 퍼즐이다. 퍼즐류를 싫어하는 사람이라면 지루할 수 있겠지만 퍼즐류를 좋아하는 사람에게는 추천한다. 말뚝이 한 종류 더 있었으면 더 어려웠겠지만 이 정도 난이도가 적당하다고 본다.
퍼즐수가 꽤나 많고 그렇게 쉽지만은 않아서 10시간이나 플레이 했다.
스테이지 수도 많고 데일리 퍼즐도 있어서 이 게임에 1100원은 전혀 아깝지 않다고 생각한다.

35689842.review:
빨강못과 파랑못을 없애나가기.

해외에서 제법 많이 알려진 페그(못박기) 게임을 컴퓨터로 옮겨온 퍼즐 게임이다. 하나의 못을 이동하기 위해선 다른 못을 반드시 뛰어넘어야 하며 같은 색의 못을 넘으면 지지대가 됐던 못은 사라진다. 이 특성을 활용해 빨강못과 파랑못을 딱 한 개씩만 남겨놓아야 한다. 배경 판으로는 삼각형, 사각형부터 별모양, 육각형까지 다양한 모양을 바탕으로 수많은 퍼즐이 준비되있으며, 도형의 각이 많을수록 퍼즐도 점점 어려워진다. 

막 쉬운 퍼즐은 아니지만, 적당히 고민하면 기본 퍼즐들은 전부 풀어나갈 정도는 된다. 대충 이리저리 비비다보면 풀리는 수준? 1,100원짜리 게임치고는 꽤 많은 양의 퍼즐이 준비되있다. 이전작처럼 매일매일 퍼즐이 바뀌는 데일리 퍼즐도 준비되있는데, 보통 매일 60개씩 새로운 퍼즐이 갱신된다고 보면 된다. 본인 기준으로 본편을 다 깨는데에만 10시간 정도 걸렸는데, 데일리 퍼즐까지 감안한다면 이 정도면 1,100원짜리 게임으로써의 가성비는 훌륭하다고 할 수 있겠다. 

여하튼 가성비 훌륭한 킬링타임용 퍼즐 게임. 이전작인 KNIGHTS 역시 킬링타임용으로는 훌륭한 가성비를 자랑하니 많이 애용해주자.

http://blog.naver.com/kitpage/221123234609

35662959.review:
I bought the bundle which includes the other puzzle game Knights.

Like I saw someone else post, I too played a peg game on a cross shaped board many years ago, but all the pegs were blue. I never cleared that one though.

These puzzles so far have been a lot of fun to figure out, even if they do seem a bit repetitive after a while.  I forgot how immersive such a simple game could be. Sit down to work on a couple of levels, and next thing you know an hour has passed.

Edit: This edit comes after completing all achievements in the game.  Once dailies are unlocked, which requires completing 80 puzzle levels, the dailies provide infinite replayability without having to redo puzzles you have already completed.  The dailies are randomized on a daily basis, so there will always be new puzzles to work on..

35613142.review:
Another great minimalist puzzle game by Arzola's
If you love KNIGHTS im sure you will also love PEG too!

35608014.review:
I'm a fan of minimalist puzzle games and this is a good one. I enjoyed Knights so I was sure I'd like PEG and after playing the initial star level, I'm hooked. I can recommend this game without reservation. I really enjoyed figuring out the rules on my own without hand holding.  

If I had one quibble, it would be that I'd like to immeadiately get to the options menu instead of being dropped straight into game play. I always like to check out the in game options before hunkering down for a first play session.  The wordless options are great, but I had to play a few pegs before I could access it. But that is really minor. If you like relaxing puzzle games, you will love PEG.

35601968.review: If you like puzzle games, you'll like PEG. It has relaxing music and fun puzzles that progress well in difficulty.

35601403.review:
Another wonderful puzzle game from this developer. The artwork is visually pleasing, and there isn't any text in it, making it perfectly understandable no matter what language you prefer. The music is relaxing, perfect for solving progressively harder puzzles, and there are five tracks to choose from if you want something different during a new session. And the price? Unbeatable. How can you turn down the promise of hours of enjoyment for only $0.99 (or less with bundle/sale discounts)?

I look forward to mastering [i]PEG[/i], as I did [i]KNIGHTS[/i], and I'm excited to see what Arzola creates in the future!
